item.title: [#144] SUS PSYCHEDELICS, INC., Part One: Profits for Prophets
item.description:
Dimitri and Khalid begin to set the setting for a profound, ecstatic, therapeutic anti-heroes’ journey into the figures, fables, and fallacies that are fueling the modern psychedelic renaissance.

PHASE ONE: INTENTIONS

Dimitri and Khalid share their intentions for this journey, which include: holding space for the promise of entheogenic therapies while acknowledging the vast Jungian shadow energy of Peter Thiel’s various psychedelics startups, his employee Hamilton Morris splashing around in a pool of gold coins like Scrooge McDuck, the endless subliminal jihad of mainstream promotion of psychedelics from Michael Pollan to Joe Rogan, attempts to patent psychedelic molecules and therapy spaces, Psymposia’s trenchant critiques of the “corporadelic” revival, toxic therapy practices seeping into MAPS clinical trials, New York Magazine/Psymposia’s “Cover Story” podcast about sexual abuse cover-ups in the psychedelic underground, potential for spiritual/emotional addiction, the growing right-wing embrace of psychedelics that really ain’t nuttin’ new, Tim Leary’s claims that LSD cured Allen Ginsberg’s homosexuality, and why everybody suddenly stopped talking about the Machine Elves…

item.title: [#143] ALCHEMIC SURRENDER, Part Two: George Soros, the Gladio Machine, and the Art of MindWar with Aaron Moulton
item.description:
Dimitri and Aaron Moulton venture even deeper into the semiotic swamp of Soros discourse to track the metastasizing spread of The Influencing Machine, including:

Art as the last green zone for madness and tactical magic, Marina Abramovic's ritual practice, looking at Michael Aquino’s career through the prism of performance art, desecration becoming consecration, doing black propaganda and calling it "art", Fiona Hill invoking the Protocols of the Elders of Zion during the Trump impeachment hearings, the aesthetic similarities between the 1989 Romanian revolution and January 6th, the rise in conspiracy theory culture since 2015, Qanon shitcoating notions of the very real “deep state”, George Soros’s hardcore Esperantisto upbringing, Esperanto as an aspirational jihad of globalization, the Sorosification of the word “woke”, NGOs as a super-governmental mafia, Srdja Popovic’s “Merry Pranksters and Autocrats”, taking OTPOR! global with the Arab Spring and Maidan, Gene Sharp and Xtinction Rebellion, Dimitri’s experience in the Occupy tactical media experiment, the prevalence of sus cultural operatives generating scripted avant-gardes, the mysterious Japanese art-girl influencer Keiko Sei, parallels with Joanna Stingray’s adventures in the USSR, Aaron getting stalked by MIBs at his State Department-funded exhibition in Bulgaria…

The Soros/Sundance Documentary Fund producing “Liberia: An Uncivil War” in 2003, weaponized magic, performance art, and television spectacle in the Liberian conflict, “The Invention of Sacred Tradition” anthology, creating sacred situations with political witchcraft, how every mass ritual from the Olympics to the Grammys is (in a sense) quite literally rubbin’ it in our faces folks, the cannibalistic spiritual bankruptcy of modern American institutions, the increasing right-wing takeover of cultural institutions in Eastern Europe, and the negative e-flux review of “The Influencing Machine” that just so happened to be written by a confirmed Soros mole.

item.title: [#142] ALCHEMIC SURRENDER: George Soros, Tactical Media, and the Rise of THE INFLUENCING MACHINE with Aaron Moulton, Part 1
item.description:
Dimitri talks with curator Aaron Moulton about THE INFLUENCING MACHINE, his controversial 2022 exhibition at the Ujazdowski Castle in Warsaw, Poland, which explores the largely forgotten but deeply consequential activities of the Soros Centers for Contemporary Art (SCCA) in early ‘90s Eastern Europe, including:

How the SCCA “landed like a UFO” in former eastern bloc countries from 1992 to 1995, engineering the scripted avant-garde, the rise of socially-engaged practice, comparing and contrasting SCCA with the CIA’s promotion of abstract expressionism, ontologies of randomness and meritocratic achievement in the art/media world…

Unleashing a dump truck of cash on two dozen cities at the height of shock therapy and currency collapse, the curiously advanced new media practices of the Centers, a Trojan Horse called “art”, grooming local artists to embrace Open Society values, subtly blacklisting artists who thrived under the socialist system of Artist Unions, building early internet infrastructures in Romania, Eastern Europe as the bleeding edge of the cyber-frontier, “cowboy wizard internaut” Jonathan Peizer, artists as the first point of call for any new technology, the mysterious "British spy lol" Bill McAllister, the 1994 “Alchemic Surrender” false flag exhibit on a Ukrainian battleship…

Suzy Meszoly’s intriguing journey from SCCA “czarina” and faithful Soros lieutenant to Buddhist vibrational healer and New Age conspiracy theorist extraordinaire, the challenges of discussing George Soros the Boogeyman, the prescient 1989 profile of Soros from a recently deceased friend of the show named TRAIN, comparing Meszoly’s 1990 Romanian exhibit “The Media Were With Us” with the 2003 German documentary “Checkmate: Strategy for a Revolution”, the CIA dramaturgy of Ceaușescu’s overthrow, Josh Harris, Pynchon’s “Bleeding Edge”, Gelitin, 9/11, Marina Abramovic and crossing the Pizzagate event horizon…

Part one of two.

item.title: [#141] IN THE MOUTH OF MESMER, Part Two: Sex Magick, Silk Toppers, & Social Control feat. Khrist Koopa
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid continue their conversation with Khrist Koopa about the rippling influence of Mesmerism on western occultism, including: more on Pascal Beverly Randolph and the Hermetic Brotherhood of Luxor, the mysterious Max Theon, Pete(r) Davidson, occultist Major General Ethan Allen Hitchcock, Randolph’s influence on the OTO, transhistorical sex magick synchronicities, Theodor Reuss reviving the Order of the Illuminati, Kate Corson, Rosicrucian Ruben Swinburne Clymer’s hagiography of Randolph, Albert Pike’s interest in Mesmerism, Charles Poyen bringing Mesmerism to America, how “enchantment can impose order” over workers via Mesmeric techniques, Poyen’s influence on Quimby, Quimby’s influence on Mary Baker Eddy and the Christian Scientists, Louis Claude Saint Martin and the danger of “astral intelligences”, dybbuks and shedim in the Zohar, the $700 Pritzker edition of the Zohar, Greek and Aramaic etymologies of the Rizz, Freud arguing that sex is six, rock & roll hypnosis, and Lil B’s staggering mesmeric abilities as witnessed by both Khrist Koopa and Dimitri in the early 2010s. Part 2 of 2.

item.title: [#140] IN THE MOUTH OF MESMER, Part One: Illuminating the Origins of Magnetism & Mind Control ft. Khrist Koopa
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid talk with music producer/researcher @KhristKoopa about the career of German scientist Franz Anton Mesmer and his theories of “animal magnetism” that took late 18th century France by storm, including: Mesmerism as precursor to Spiritualism, the ain’t nuttin’ new overlaps between Serious Science and metaphysics throughout history, Mesmer’s confirmed membership in the Bavarian Illuminati, discovering a field of “invisible fire” more subtle than ether, Mesmer’s remarkable rizz, running group “seances” in Paris, curing the blindness of piano prodigy Maria Theresia von Paradis, hanging out with Mozart, Jesuits lurking on the periphery, the Illuminati’s passion for tactical PR and ARGs, early theories of the subconscious, yet another Ben Franklin deboonking saga, noting the real phenomenon of hypnosis operating within Mesmer’s “magnetic” therapy, tracing the legacy of magnetism through Freud up to modern mind control, and how the under-examined sex magick teachings of African-American occultist Pascal Beverly Randolph and his Hermetic Brotherhood of Luxor/Light influenced Helena Blavatsky and Aleister Crowley. Part 1 of 2.

item.title: #139b - DEMON FORCES 4, Part Two: KILLING DOE
item.description:
Dimitri conducts a forensic examination of the Masterminds, the Coincidences, the Puzzles, the Intrigues, and the Deceits surrounding the assassination of Liberian President Samuel Doe on 9/9/90, including:

The US-Chad connection, Bill Casey bloodying Qaddafi’s nose in the Auzou Strip, Chet Crocker and Jim Bishop running guns to Hissene Habré, the 1987 Toyota War, Stingers and TOWs, US-French cooperation and Jean-Christophe “Papamadit” Mitterand…

Taylor allies Moses Duopu and Elmer Johnson killing Sankara, drama in the NPFL leadership, Prince Johnson’s daring commando raid on Gbutuo, Taylor being a SCARY man who depended on LIARS, forming the breakaway INPFL, the mysterious murders of Duopu, Elmer Johnson, Cooper Teah, and Jackson F. Doe inside NPFL territory, Bush’s White House ordering Herman Cohen to not fly Doe into exile, and the emergence of ECOMOG…

Emmanuel Bowier’s futile efforts to convince Doe to leave, realizing The Heat Is On, the secret Israeli code, Doe screaming at Bowier that he’s “gonna die killing white people” if US Marines land onshore, Bowier’s perilous escape from Monrovia on Gus Kouwenhoven’s plane…

Herman Cohen’s surreal meetings with Prince Johnson and Charles Taylor in August, Bob Gates’ “disgusting” proposal to dump Liberian-American refugees in West African tent camps, ECOMOG’s arrival after which “some conspiracies took place”, the Prince Johnson-Doe truce, US military advisors skulking around outside the wire, and Doe’s fateful visit to ECOMOG headquarters on September 9th, 1990…

American novelist Denis Johnson’s haunting dispatch from the Prince Johnson compound after Doe’s death, watching The Video, tracking down the mysterious Sellie Thompson, William Glay’s treachery, Bowier’s numerological premonitions about the “bad days” of 9/9/89 and 9/9/90, and the staggering dracularity of President George Bush’s “new world order” address to Congress on 9/11/90 - just one day after Samuel Doe’s violent death.

item.description: Dimitri and Khalid wander into the Pine Barrens of New Jersey to uncover the colonial origins of the chimeric cryptid known as the Jersey Devil, including: monstrous births and demonic fiddlers in the New World, Daniel and Titan Leeds, the almanac wars of 1730s America, Loyalist Daniel Leeds’ subliminal jihad against the Quakers, Benjamin Franklin attacking the Flying Spaghetti Monster of almanacs, the mystery of “Ong’s Hat: Gateway to the Dimensions”, Hakim Bey and Joseph Matheny creating the first internet ARG around Pine Barrens lore, the Incunabula zine, the “Institute of Chaos Studies” and “Moorish Science Ashram” in the Pine Barrens, cognitive chaos experiments, reality-shifting in an inter-dimensional egg, connections to Discordianism and the Fundamental Fysiks Group in Berkeley, Stanford LSD/FFG alum Nick Herbert, Jack Sarfatti, the twin ARGs of western fighters joining ISIS and the YPG, Rojava and Khilafah as Temporary Autonomous Zones, and the potentially satanic murder of Jersey teenager Jeanette DePalma in 1972.

item.description: Dimitri, Khalid, and Jay the Neuroscientist (@The_Hague_ICC) conclude their exploration of cybernetics with a discussion of: RD Laing’s “anti-psychiatry”, Laing’s decade at the Tavistock Institute, Dr. Jolly West and the Haight Ashbury Free Clinic, Syd Barrett going insane on LSD despite (because of?) Laing’s “guidance”, Laing and Leary, Laing vs. Stokely Carmichael, the Dimes Square Fascist Humiliation Ritual, Heinz von Foerster and Second Order Cybernetics, Foerster’s Theosophist grandmother Marie Lang, the Doomsday Equation, Protestant gifted child/future Macy Conference chairman Warren Sturgis McCullough and Henry Sloane Coffin, Bertram Borden Boltwood, “The Minds of Men” documentary, Alex Gibney’s stepfather Peter Sloane Coffin getting tapped into Skull and Bones by George H.W. Bush, “The Ultimate Think Tank: The Rise of the Santa Fe Institute Libertarian”, Robert Maxwell and PROMIS, Ghislaine’s twin sisters Christine and Isabel Maxwell, Carl Djerassi and Alexander Djerassi, the “Friends” of Libya and Syria Conferences, Reddit power-moderator u/maxwellhill, Cormac McCarthy, Zorro Ranch, and Jeffrey Epstein bankrolling the co-optation of cybernetic thought to advance the sinister philanthrocapitalist agenda of the sicko ruling class.

Part 3 of 4.

item.description: Dimitri, Khalid, and Neuroscientist Jay (@The_Hague_ICC) continue exploring the complex history of cybernetics, including: “from electroshock to the psychedelic sixties”, Grey Walter’s EEG research, the discovery of alpha/beta/delta brainwaves, the expectancy wave and readiness potential, Walter’s robotic tortoises, the popularity of biofeedback today, the sus “world brain”, computer-brain interfaces for video gaming, SRI’s “Changing Images of Man”, Ross Ashby, “forcing an environment to reveal itself” and the mass shooter phenomenon, feedback flicker and the Stroboscope, silk topper sicko William Seward Burroughs, Jr. and Allen Ginsberg’s MK-Ultra LSD flicker experiments in Palo Alto, the California Ideology, the Dream Machine, the embrace of stroboscopic lights by Ken Kesey, Del Close, and The Grateful Dead, Stafford Beer and Chile’s Project CYBERSYN, Beer’s 2002 lecture about cybernetically understanding 9/11, the Satanic Panic artificial dialectic, cybernetics-as-dialectics, and counter-erming Western leftists who reject the synthesis of “parapolitical” and Historical Materialist analyses.

item.title: #126 - WE ARE THE ROBOTS: A Subliminal History of Cybernetics, Part 1 (with Jay @TheHague_ICC)

Part 1 of 4.

item.title: #125e - CONTRA VII, Part 5: The Assassination of CCR by the Coward Burton Kanter / Effigy
item.description:
In the final chapter of CONTRA VII, Dimitri and Khalid explore how Creedence Clearwater Revival went from the #1 chooglin’ rock band in the world in 1970 to having their entire fortune stolen by Burt Kanter’s notoriously shady, mafia and CIA-infested Castle Bank and Trust.

SIDE A: THE ASSASSINATION OF CCR BY THE COWARD BURTON KANTER

How CCR’s headlining set at Woodstock got sabotaged by the Grateful Dead, the silk topper inspiration for “Fortunate Son”, not getting respect from the “cool” rock media, providing material support to the American Indian occupation of Alcatraz, renegotiating their contract with Fantasy Records bigwig Saul Zaentz, Saul convincing CCR to put all their earnings offshore in Castle Bank and a grapevine of shell entities, Tom Fogerty’s painful departure in ’71, John’s revenge on Negative Stu and No-Shuffle Doug with “Mardi Gras” in ’72, the end of CCR, Tom’s underrated solo career/chooglin’ with suslord Jerry Garcia, Tom subtweeting John on “Sign of the Devil”, John’s stint with David Geffen and the scrapped lo-fi “Hoodoo” album, realizing that ALL of Creedence’s money has vanished into a “Bahamian abyss”, years of seclusion and lawsuits, getting even with Burt Kanter, Zaentz’s new role as serrrious Hollywood producer of “One Flew Over The Cuckoo’s Nest” and “Amadeus”, John realizing he’s Zaentz’s Pinocchio puppet, his 1985 return with “Zanz Kant Danz” and “Mr. Greed”, Tom’s new “best friend” Saul Zaentz, more lawsuits and fighting, Tom’s tragic death from AIDS in 1990, his dying wish that the other three Creedence guys choogle together one last time, and John’s NOT-on-haqq refusal to play with Stu, Doug, and Tom’s son Jeff at the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame Induction in 1993.

SIDE B: EFFIGY

Donald Trump’s purchase of Resorts International in 1987, cocaine trafficking in 1980s Bahamas, Medellin Cocaine Nazi Carlos “Joe” Lehder making Norman’s Cay his castle and garden, US Ambassador to the Bahamas/Slava Ukraini Banderite/WACL suslord Lev Dobriansky telling the CIA station chief to “find another job”, Kanter’s relationships with international oil man Bruce Rappaport and Bill Casey, Indonesian oil schemes in the 1960s, the Bank of New York, the ill-fated Aqaba oil pipeline project in Iraq, looting the Soviet economy, Antiguan training grounds for Contras, IDF machine guns for Colombian drug cartels, BCCI/Rappaport overlaps, “left-leaning wealth advisor” Josh Kanter’s Alliance for a Better Utah and Kanter Family Foundation, Linda Pritzker aka Lama Tsomo’s Namchak Foundation in Montana, Nick Pritzker bankrolling Gavin Newsom’s career, Tom Pritzker running the Center for Strategic and International Studies, Nick and Tom Pritzker’s multiple phone numbers in Epstein’s black book, Virginia Roberts Giuffre’s allegations against Tom Pritzker, the Kanter law firm of Neal, Gerber, & Eisenberg’s continuing services to the Pritzker family, and last but not least, some thoughts on how it doesn’t whip ass when left-leaning media influencers try to meme Big Boy JB Pritzker into the White House, especially if one’s uncle happens to have been a Burt Kanter protegé/Pritzker family attorney for the last 50 years.

item.title: #125d - CONTRA VII, Part Four: Dead On Revival

item.description: Dimitri and Khalid explore the life and work of ‘60s LA psychedelic folk singer Jim Sullivan, his haunting Wrecking Crew-backed 1969 debut album “UFO”, and his infinitely mysterious, still-unsolved disappearance (suicide? mafia murder? alien abduction?) in the New Mexico desert in 1975.

item.title: #74 - GOING TO MARS IN A BUCKET: “Mission To Mars”, “Red Planet”, and “Ghosts of Mars” Revisited
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid search for predictive programming and blue beam themes in a troika of failed Y2K-era Mars blockbusters: Brian De Palma’s “Mission To Mars”, John Carpenter’s “Ghost of Mars”, and Antony Hoffman’s “Red Planet”. Also discussed: HG Wells’ dream of a liberal fascisti, Edgar Rice Burroughs’ love of eugenics, Percival Lowell’s popularization of canals on Mars, Bruce De Palma’s zero point energy n-drive, Wehrner Von Braun’s vision of an “Elon” governing Martian society, and the Boston Dynamics dog AMEE in “Red Planet” who goes haywire and slays every woketard astronaut in sight.

item.description: Dimitri and Khalid dissect troubled oil heir Andrew Getty’s infinitely disturbing 2017 horror film “The Evil Within” and try to decode what it says about one of America's most wealthy and influential families.

item.description: Dimitri and Khalid dissect the influential 1974 Stanford Research Institute white paper “Changing Images of Man” and discuss its shoddy historical ontologies, the Kettering Foundation’s “high leverage” intellectual moonshot, Joseph Campbell’s monomyth and prediction of Star Wars/MCU culture, lazily conflating Sufism, Rosicrucianism, and Freemasonry, favorably comparing the Human Potential Movement to Nazism, favorably citing L. Ron Hubbard and other new age MK cultists, weaponizing environmental crises and the “overpopulation” scare, Robert Maxwell’s World Order Models Project, harnessing parapsychological forces, talking about dialectics but never mentioning the M-word, Robert EL Masters’ obsessions with LSD & Crowleyan sex magick, corporate meditation retreats to condition the C-suite Einsatzgruppen, and the many parallels with Klaus Schwab’s “Great Reset” of global capitalism.

item.title: #67 - THE VELVET FOG OF ALTERNATIVITY: A Subliminal History of KPFA/Pacifica Radio
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid dive deep into the history of alternative media pioneer KPFA/Pacifica Radio, the anarcho-pacifist subliminal jihad of Pacifica founder/Phillips oil heir Lewis Hill, ubiquitous Theosophical influences, Betty Ford-Aquino’s literary program and murky presence on the Pacifica Board, MK mystic Alan Watts, Pauline Kael, Betty Ford-Aquino’s role in popularizing “Doctor Zhivago” and “Howl”, Ginsberg’s MK-Ultra scientist cousin Oscar Janiger, Dwight MacDonald’s homicidal obsession with “Stalinoids”, getting massive financial support from the CIA Yale bluebloods running the Ford Foundation, and various influences on/synchronicities with today’s “alternative” left-wing podcast landscape.

item.title: #65 - QPOCALYPSE: After The Storm
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid discuss various aspects of the recent HBO docuseries “Q: Into The Storm”, the multi-Q theory, Aquino erasure in the HBO doc, the new industry of goldpilled Q-exposers on Medium, the CNP/WACL/John Birch Society Nexus, Michael Flynn stepping into the shoes of John Singlaub, the revenge of the gold standard, Jim Watkins’ satanic eyebrows and possible Aquino connections, “I AM” Theosophy and American fascism, General Paul Vallely’s “Army of Northern Virginia” and the Intelligence Support Activity inside JSOC, Jesuit/Opus Dei proxy warfare at Standing Rock, Dave Troy’s hot take that #metoo was a CNP 4th-generation warfare psyop, and Dimitri’s long-ago encounter with the sus New Age Light Goddess who may be Q.

item.description: Dimitri and Khalid discuss former SDS member Carl Oglesby’s 1976 book “The Yankee and Cowboy War”, tensions between Northeastern Atlanticists and Southwestern oil/defense tycoons, the importance of “the (endless) frontier” in the development of US capitalism, the Cowboy hit on JFK, the mafia and Gehlen-Vlasov Nazi spy network’s integration into the US security state, the Bushes shapeshifting into Yankee-Cowboy chimeras, refuting Chomsky’s sus conspiracy ontology, the Yankee countercoup against Nixon, Howard Hughes, Resorts International & Cowboy Trump, the Atlanticist fetish for “special war” embraced by JFK and Obama, Sherman Skolnick, and whether cyberspace & the self are the current/final frontiers of the Yankee-Cowboy sinister dialectic.

item.title: #57 - FROM CALIFORNIA IDEOLOGY TO CYBER-COMMUNIST UTOPIA: Professorbrained Theories of the Technofuture

Dimitri and Khalid discuss the incisive and prescient 1995 essay “The Californian Ideology” by Richard Barbrook and Andy Cameron, as well as their equally misguided and delusional 1999 essay “CYBER-COMMUNISM: How the Americans are Superseding Capitalism in Cyberspace”, wherein they postulate that Silicon Valley is fulfilling the dream of “Stalinist Communism”.

“The Californian Ideology” (1995): https://www.metamute.org/editorial/articles/californian-ideology

“CYBER-COMMUNISM: How the Americans are Superseding Capitalism in Cyberspace” (1999): https://www.monoskop.org/images/5/5f/Barbrook_Richard_2000_Cyber-Communism_How_the_Americans_are_Superseding_Capitalism_in_Cyberspace.pdf

item.title: #55 - MANUFACTURING THE CONSENSUAL DOMAIN: George Estabrooks, Milton Erickson, and Weaponized Hypnosis
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid discuss the groundbreaking, unsettling hypnosis research of psychologists George Estabrooks and Milton H. Erickson, programming hypnotic operatives during World War 2, Estabrooks’s eager correspondence with J. Edgar Hoover, hypnotizing subjects without their consent, inducing multiple personalities, right-wing hypno-informants infiltrating communist movements, Estabrooks’s sublimated eugenics and proto-transhumanist beliefs, Erickson’s experiments with automatic writing, the susness of NLP, and Scientology’s bold claim in 2004 that Al Qaeda suicide bombers were being scientifically hypnoprogrammed by arch-sicko psychlo Dr. Ayman al-Zawahiri.

item.title: #53 - COLORLESS GREEN IDOLS PSYOP FURIOUSLY: Defrocking Chomsky
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid ruthlessly discuss the Dr. Jekkyl/MIB Hyde aspects of Noam Chomsky’s Radical Intellectual career, including: the legendary 1971 TV debate between Chomsky and Foucault, Lorenzoae’s “Chomsky and the Compatible Left” essay, Chomsky’s saintly status in the left-liberal alt-media ecosystem, his influential linguistics theories and simultaneous involvement with USAF command and control projects, Chomsky-as-Pentagon’s very own Lysenko, comparing Chomsky’s dismissal of left-wing “conspiracy theories” to Carl Oglesby’s “The Yankee and Cowboy War”, his bizarre insistence that the JFK assassination was a meaningless event, and why Chomsky reaches for his revolver whenever he hears the word “dialectics”.

item.title: #51 - WATER WALK WITH ME: Elisa Lam and The Haunting of the Cecil Hotel
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid discuss Netflix’s recent portrayal of the 2013 disappearance and death of Elisa Lam at the notorious Cecil Hotel in downtown Los Angeles, Dimitri’s physical proximity to the action, the Dorner synchronicity, the endlessly analyzed elevator video, tHe WeB sLeUtHs, LAM-ELISA and the tuberculosis outbreak in Skid Row, the 2005 film "Dark Water", Chameleo-adjacent theories about invisibility cloak technology that actually does exist, bizarre synchronicities with the Last Bookstore’s website, and the unforgivable persecution of Morbid.

item.title: #49 - SELJUKIAN MINDWARRIOR: Rumi and The Feats of the Knowers of God
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid discuss the heady 14th-century Rumi biography “The Feats of the Knowers of God”, the constant interplay between “mystics” and power elites throughout history, misleading hippiefied/de-Islamified translations of Rumi in the west, Rumi’s deadly psionic abilities, similarities between Sufi whirling dervishes and Deadheads/Vito Paulekas’s freaks, and perceptions of Genghis Khan as Allah’s instrument.

item.title: #45 - CONTRA V: Victory
item.description: In this fifth installment of the CONTRA series, Dimitri and Khalid explore Peter Schweizer’s revealing 1994 book “Victory: The Reagan Administration’s Secret Strategy That Hastened The Fall Of The Soviet Union” wherein CIA director Bill Casey assembles a secret ecumenical alliance between the Reagan White House, the House of Saud, the Vatican, Israel, the Pakistani ISI, and China to eviscerate the soft Islamic underbelly of the USSR, bankroll Solidarity/bankrupt the Polish government, and PSYOP the Soviets into financial crisis with the apocalyptic threat of SDI.

item.title: #43 - ON HER MAJESTY’S SECRET KILL LIST: The Conspiracy Ontologies of Lyndon LaRouche
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid take an extremely deep dive into the chameleonic political philosophies of perennial presidential candidate Lyndon LaRouche, his origins in Trotskyism, his 1970s turn to MK cult techniques and far right-wing entryism, his P.A.N.I.C. over AIDS/putting lockdown proposals on the California ballot, his support of Reagan and advocacy for the Strategic Defense Initiative, his obsession with the perfidious machinations of the British Empire, his hatred of the USSR and essentialist conception of the Russian peasant “Raskolniki” who reject the Filioque of Western Christianity, his time in prison with televangelist Jim Bakker, his strange involvement in the Franklin Scandal, his overarching obsession with classical music and Verdi tuning, and LaRouchePAC’s curious support for both Donald Trump and Xi Jinping.

item.title: #40: THE GREAT SHAPESHIFT: Hyperreality of the Reptoids
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid explore the origins and cultural impact of reptilian conspiracy theories from Blavatsky to Icke, the dinosaur connection, the dragon connection, the psycho-allegorical resonance of elites-as-reptoids, Carl Sagan’s “reptilian brain” pseudoscience, the Nashville RV bomber’s censored reptoid manifesto, and Catherine Austin Fitts’s curious close encounter with our ‘toid overlords at a futurist DC think tank in the late 90s.

item.title: #38 - EXTINCTION LEVEL EVENT 201: Busta Rhymes, The Five Percent Nation, and Anti-Satanic Apocalypse Rap
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid discuss Busta Rhymes’s ominous 2020 album “Extinction Level Event 2: The Wrath of God”, his feelings about the plandemic and civil unrest, his apocalyptic 1990s albums that maybe prophesied 9/11, the insufferable erm-ing of music journalists, Busta’s relationship to the Five Percent Nation, the mysterious origins and disappearance of NOI founder Wallace Fard Muhammad, Clarence 13X, Jakubian tricknology, and Louis Farrakhan’s entanglements with UFOs, the assassination of Malcolm X, Muammar Qaddafi, and Dianetics.

item.title: #36 - Le Grand Guignol du Gilles de Rais
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid discuss the horrific satanic crimes of knight/lord/pedophile serial killer Gilles de Rais in 15th century France, his military career with Joan of Arc, his simultaneous descent into ritual mass theatre and ritual child sacrifice, Crowley’s revisionism, attempts to interpret de Rais as either a “medieval” vs. “modern” figure, his maudlin public confession and carefully ritualized execution, and the various parallels to Epstein/Larry King/Dutroux/Savile/Nixon/Josh Harris etc.

item.title: #32 - BAWDY BOARD OF DEATH: Just Saying Non-Nein to Ouija
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid discuss the ambiguous properties and history of the Ouija board, Dimitri’s chilling personal Ouija experience, Sylvia Plath’s Ouija-channelled poetry, Ouija-inspired satanic murders, the “Gulf Breeze Six” Army intelligence analysts who went AWOL after a Ouija board told them to, the Ouija interests of SRI/Esalen notables Andrija Puharich and R. Gordon Wasson, Aleister Crowley’s warnings that Ouija boards can be dangerous, and whether Ouija control is a better idea than gun control.

item.title: #30 - ON THE SPECTRUM OF SICKOS: Stallone's "Cobra" and Psycho Cop Cinema in the 1980s
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid discuss the 1986 Sylvester Stallone/George P. Cosmatos film "Cobra", the para-satanic murder axe cult terrorizing LA, Khalid's ASD diagnosis of Cobretti, the "not too preachy" pro-cop/criminals-as-virus themes in Stallone's screenplay, and how "Cobra" influenced the two very MK cult-heavy films by George's son Panos Cosmatos.

item.title: #28 - CONTRA IV: Interlock
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid discuss Patricia Goldstone's fascinating book "Interlock: Art, Conspiracy, and the Shadow Worlds of Mark Lombardi", CIA influence in the post-war American art scene, the hot money networks of George HW Bush & Co., Lombardi's personal vendetta against the Bush family, his tracing of BCCI, Nugan Hand, and the Iran-Contra Enterprise, his highly suspicious "conceptual" suicide in March 2000, and Goldstone's hypothesis that the Black Eagle Trust/Yamashita's Gold was the genesis of the interlocked shadow economy mapped out in Lombardi's work.

item.title: #25 - COSMONAUT JESUS CHRIST: Adventures in Soviet Parapsychology
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid discuss the 1970s books “Psychic Discoveries Behind The Iron Curtain” and “The New Soviet Psychic Discoveries”, the Stalin-tested stage magician Wolf Messing, Kirlian photography, interdimensional UFOs, ancient cosmonauts from the doomed planet Phaeton, Soviet efforts to resolve the contradictions between scientific and religious phenomenology, energetic ghosts, and whether or not we should aspire to join the sus AI God Supercivilization lurking in the heart of the Milky Way Galaxy.

item.title: #23 - MAN SAY THINGS NOT: Dr. John C. Lilly and The Day Of The Dolphin
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid discuss Mike Nichols’s underrated 1973 conspiracy thriller “The Day Of The Dolphin” and Dr. John C. Lilly’s overlapping obsessions with cetaceans, psychedelics, and cybernetics.

item.title: #21 - MILLER LIED: Reconsidering The Salem Witch Trials
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid discuss (and challenge) the common mythos of the 1692 witch trials in Salem, Massachusetts, the ubiquitous belief in witchcraft during the 17th century, the slanderous lies spread by Robert Calef against Cotton Mather, Arthur Miller's butchering of historical fact, the evidence that some of the accused *were* actually practicing witches, and various interesting synchronicities with Grover Furr's controversial "Khrushchev Lied" book about the Soviet "show trials" of the late 1930s.

item.title: #19 - THE TARGET IS YOUR BRAIN: Soviet Fears of Psycho-Imperialism
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid discuss the chillingly prescient 1984 Soviet TV documentary "The Target Is Your Brain", its profiles of MK-ULTRA scientists John Gittinger and José Delgado, US and Soviet research into weaponized "psychoenergetic" abilities, the parasocial intimacy of Voice Of America (and dirtbag left?) broadcasters, director Felix Sobolev's optimistic social psychology documentaries and mystical interests, and how Borat 2 slanders (among many other things) the glorious legacy of Soviet cinema.

item.title: #17 - Spy Of The Heart: Pseudomysticism and Idries Shah
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid discuss the charmed career of "Sufi master" Idries Shah, his MK-ULTRA scientist friends, the Wiccan/OTO connection, plagiarizing George Gurdjieff, Western instrumentalizations of Eastern mysticism, and Shah's 1980s turn as the mujahideen-stanning Tom Clancy of the Soviet-Afghan war.

item.title: #15 - The Oh/Nein/@: Black Opfs [Part II]
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid discuss the Satanic, O9A-inspired neo-nazi terrorist groups Atomwaffen and The Base, the string of murders and foiled bombings connected to both, and the extremely sus defense contractor background of The Base's leader. [Part II of II]

item.title: #14 - The Oh/Nein/@ [Part I]
item.description:
Dimitri and Khalid discuss the origins and sinister dialectics of the 0rd3r of N1ne @ngles, Anton Long’s intra-Satanic letter feud with Michael Aquino, and their dark synthesis of Left Hand Path magick, violent ritualized criminality, and National Socialism. 

[Part I of II]

item.title: #12 - DEN of Daemons: Marc Collins-Rector, Brock Pierce, and the Emancipation of Buffalo JA
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid discuss the infamously predatory Digital Entertainment Network of late '90s Hollywood, Brock Pierce's many rebirths from bitcoin evangelist to 2020 presidential candidate, and a network of disturbing Facebook profiles whose twisted obsession with the mysterious "Buffalo JA" nearly drove Dimitri insane in 2014.

item.title: #10 - LIBER XXXXL: In The Shadow Of Giants
item.description: Dimitri and Khalid discuss the outsized role of Giants in early mythological and religious traditions, why Evangelical Christians and occultists are both fascinated with the Nephilim, and the mysterious tale of the "Giant of Kandahar" who allegedly ambushed a squad of US Marines in 2002.
